mapper.sql: id, order_no, user_id, maid_user_id, maid_money, maid_percent, order_actual_money, merchant_id, product_id, product_name, level, level_name, create_time, available
mapper.insert:
insert into ss_maid_info
order_no,
user_id,
maid_user_id,
maid_money,
maid_percent,
order_actual_money,
merchant_id,
product_id,
product_name,
`level`,
level_name,
create_time,
available,
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maidUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{maidMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{maidPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderActualMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{available,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ss_maid_info
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maid_user_id = #{maidUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maid_money = #{maidMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
maid_percent = #{maidPercent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_actual_money = #{orderActualMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT * from (
( SELECT case when usr.logo_url is null then "http://chuang-saas.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/upload/image/20180911/6a989ec302994c6c98c2d4810f9fbcb2.png" else usr.logo_url end AS logoUrl, usr.real_name AS realName, INSERT ( usr.register_mobile, 4, 4, '****' ) AS phone, smi.`LEVEL` AS `LEVEL`, smi.level_name as levelName, smi.maid_money / 100 AS maidMoney, smi.create_time AS createTime FROM ss_maid_info smi, ss_user usr WHERE usr.available = 1 AND smi.available = 1 AND smi.maid_user_id = usr.user_id AND smi.user_id = #{userId} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT CASE maid_type WHEN 0 THEN 'http://chuang-saas.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/upload/image/20180823/0acd14b3553b4d4c89075b281ca80393.png' ELSE 'http://chuang-saas.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/upload/image/20180823/40e1e20cb5114dbd95ba285f7102d236.png' END AS logoUrl, CASE maid_type WHEN 0 THEN '团队奖' ELSE '纵向奖' END AS realName, '' AS phone, '' AS `LEVEL`, '' as levelName, maid_money / 100 AS maidMoney, create_time AS createTime FROM ss_maid_info_by_month WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND available = 1 )) t ORDER BY t.createTime desc

SELECT su.real_name AS realName, smi.order_actual_money / 100 AS money, smi.create_time AS buyTime, smi.maid_money/100 as maidMoney, su.register_mobile AS mobile FROM ss_user su, ss_maid_info smi WHERE su.referrer = #{userId} and su.user_id=smi.maid_user_id and su.referrer=smi.user_id

SELECT usr.real_name as realName, so.actual_money/100 as money, so.payment_time as buyTime, so.actual_money*sp.maid_percent/10000 as maidMoney, usr.register_mobile as mobile, sp.`level` AS `level`, sp.level_name AS levelName FROM ss_user usr, ss_order so, ss_product sp WHERE usr.available = 1 AND usr.referrer = #{userId} AND so.available = 1 AND so.order_status>=1 AND usr.user_id = so.user_id and usr.member_level=sp.`level`

SELECT count(*) FROM ss_user usr, ss_order so, ss_product sp WHERE usr.available = 1 AND usr.referrer = #{userId} AND so.available = 1 AND so.order_status>=1 AND usr.user_id = so.user_id and usr.member_level=sp.`level`
